project.name: J-C835A-POIX-03-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF19-01
project.description: This test takes a string, and reads through the string, printing out each character with ASCII value greater than 48. If it encounters a character with ASCII value less than 48, it will fail to increment the loop counter, and loop forever.

iopair.name: J-C835A-POIX-03-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^(-|\.)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"
